hero.title: Save Time, Teach Smarter!
hero.subtitle: Help your STEM students thrive with cutting-edge AI-powered features

tool1.title: Tool 1: AI-Powered Correction with Tailored Resources

nextGenTools.title: Transformative Education
nextGenTools.subtitle: Imagine being able to spend most of your time on what truly matters: helping your students thrive.

exerciseCorrections.title: Exercise Corrections
exerciseCorrections.description: Save hours of grading time - just snap a photo of any handwritten work and get complete correction reports in seconds.
exerciseCorrections.longDescription: No more wrestling with partial credits or writing detailed explanations - our AI handles it all, providing fair grades with clear reasoning. Best of all, it automatically identifies knowledge gaps, finds relevant teaching resources, and creates practice exercises.
benefits: Grade any handwritten work in seconds, not hours
Get fair partial credit with explained reasoning

personalizedTutoring.title: Personalized Tutoring
personalizedTutoring.description: See exactly how your students are performing with our smart dashboard that does the heavy lifting for you.
personalizedTutoring.longDescription: Instantly spot when a student starts struggling with a concept, celebrate their improvements, and get AI-suggested study plans tailored to each student. No more guesswork - know exactly which topics need attention and get ready-made materials to help your students succeed.

exerciseForge.title: Exercise Forge
exerciseForge.description: Create perfect practice materials in minutes. Upload existing exams for instant variations.
exerciseForge.longDescription: Brainstorm with our AI to design custom exercises that match your exact teaching goals. Every exercise comes with detailed step-by-step solutions and customizable hints, giving you everything needed to support student learning.

callToAction.heading: Ready to Transform Your Teaching?
callToAction.subheading: Join thousands of educators enhancing their STEM instruction with AI-powered tools

educatorChallenges.heading: Understanding Your Biggest Challenges
educatorChallenges.allChallengesBannerSub: We’ve listened to you. The common teaching struggles make it harder to focus on what you love: teaching.
educatorChallenges.p1: STEM educators struggle with time-consuming grading and personalized support.
educatorChallenges.p2: It is time consuming to give each student the individualized attention they need to thrive—which is what makes teaching so fulfilling.
educatorChallenges.p3: We help you overcome these struggles!

manual.title: Manual Grading Marathon
manual.solution: Expert instant assessment for complex problem-solving

partialCredit.solution: Step-by-step error analysis with intelligent credit allocation

personalization.solution: Automated personalized learning paths based on performance

churn.title: Churn to Create New Exercises
churn.solution: Automated generation of targeted practice materials

timeConsuming.title: Time-Consuming Drafting of Corrections
timeConsuming.solution: Complete step-by-step correction and hints to help students

overwhelmingProgress.title: Overwhelming Progress Tracking
overwhelmingProgress.solution: Real-time analytics dashboard with performance insights for each student

draftingPersonalized.title: Drafting Personalized Plans
draftingPersonalized.solution: Smart learning path generator based on student gaps

learningResources.title: Guides & Tutorials
learningResources.description: Watch our comprehensive tutorials to learn how to leverage all features and maximize your teaching efficiency with our AI-powered tools.

faq.heading: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about our platform

faqs.question: How does the correction limit work
faqs.answer: Each feature uses a specific number of AI credits. For example, exercise corrections use 5 credits, while generating reports uses 10 credits. The Basic plan includes 500 credits per month, while the Professional plan includes 2000 credits. Unused credits don't roll over to the next month.

faqs.question: Can I upgrade or downgrade my plan
faqs.answer: Yes, you can change your plan at any time. Changes take effect at the start of your next billing cycle. Please have a look at the Pricing page for further details.

faqs.question: What features are available with the Basic plan?
faqs.answer: You have access to automated grading of handwritten assignments, tailored online videos based on the results of the exercise corrections, personalised new exercises including solutions, performance tracking of the students for all concepts covered over time, and more.

faqs.question: What types of assignments can be graded
faqs.answer: Our AI can grade a wide range of STEM assignments, including mathematics, physics, and chemistry. It handles both numerical problems and step-by-step solutions.

faqs.question: What types of assignments can be graded
faqs.answer: Our AI can grade a wide range of STEM assignments, including mathematics, physics, and chemistry. It handles both numerical problems and step-by-step solutions.

faqs.question: Can I use this for non-STEM subjects like languages or history?
faqs.answer: Currently, our platform is specifically designed for STEM subjects (Science, Technology, Engineering, Mathematics) and doesn't support subjects like languages, history, or geography. This specialization allows us to provide highly accurate assessment and feedback for mathematical equations, scientific notation, and technical diagrams.

faqs.question: How do AI credits work?
faqs.answer: Each feature uses a specific number of AI credits. For example, exercise corrections use 5 credits, while generating reports uses 10 credits. The Basic plan includes 500 credits per month, while the Professional plan includes 2000 credits. Unused credits don't roll over to the next month.

faqs.question: What's the difference between Basic and Pro subscription?
faqs.answer: The Basic plan (€9.99/month) includes 500 AI credits and supports up to 5 student profiles. The Professional plan (€19.99/month) includes 2000 AI credits, unlimited student profiles, and early access to new features. Both plans include core features like handwriting analysis and exercise generation.

faqs.question: Can I upgrade or downgrade my plan?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can upgrade to Professional at any time. To downgrade from Professional to Basic, you'll need to cancel your current subscription and resubscribe once it expires. Changes take effect at the start of your next billing cycle.

faqs.question: Is there a free trial available?
faqs.answer: Yes, new users can try all Basic plan features free for 7 days. No credit card is required for the trial period.

faqs.question: What are your support response times?
faqs.answer: We aim to respond to technical issues within 24 hours and to general feedback within 2 business days. For feature requests, we provide detailed feedback within a week, including whether it can be incorporated into our development pipeline.

faqs.question: What's included in the Institution plan
faqs.answer: The Institution plan is customized to your organization's needs. It includes everything in Professional, plus custom integrations, dedicated support, and special training for your staff.

contactSupport.heading: Still have questions?
contactSupport.description: Our support team is here to help you get the most out of our platform

euDataProtection.heading: EU Data Protection Compliance (GDPR)
paragraphs: We are committed to complying with the EU General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR). As an EU resident, you have the right to access, rectify, or request erasure of your personal data at any time. You also have the right to object to or restrict certain processing of your data, as well as the right to data portability. To exercise these rights, please contact us at support@robinagent.ai.

We will store your personal data only for as long as it is necessary to provide our services or as otherwise required by applicable law. When we no longer need your personal data, we will securely delete or anonymize it.

section1.heading: 1. Agreement to Terms
paragraphs: By accessing and using RobinAgent's services, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service and our Privacy Policy. If you disagree with any part of these terms, you may not access our services.

section2.heading: 2. Description of Service
paragraphs: RobinAgent provides AI-powered educational tools and services designed to assist educators in grading, creating educational content, and managing student progress. Our service utilizes artificial intelligence technology to provide automated assistance and insights.

section3.heading: 3. Subscription and Payment Terms
paragraphs: Our service is provided on a subscription basis. Payments are processed securely through Stripe on a monthly billing cycle. You may cancel your subscription at any time, and the cancellation will take effect at the end of your current billing period. No refunds are provided for partial months of service.
If required under EU consumer protection laws, you may also be entitled to a statutory 'cooling-off period' for certain subscription purchases.

section4.heading: 4. User Accounts and Data
paragraphs: When you create an account, you must provide accurate and complete information. You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account and for all activities that occur under it. We store your data securely using Supabase infrastructure and utilize AI services to process your content. All data processing complies with applicable privacy laws and our Privacy Policy.

section5.heading: 5. Intellectual Property Rights
paragraphs: The Service and its original content, features, and functionality are owned by RobinAgent and are protected by international copyright, trademark, and other intellectual property laws.

section6.heading: 6. User Content and AI Processing
paragraphs: You retain rights to any content you submit, post, or display on or through the Service. By submitting content, you grant us permission to process it using AI technologies and store it securely to provide our services. We do not claim ownership of your content but require these rights to provide our service effectively.

section7.heading: 7. Privacy and Data Protection
paragraphs: Your privacy is important to us. We process your data using AI technologies and store it securely using Supabase. All data processing is carried out in compliance with applicable EU data protection legislation, including the GDPR. Please review our Privacy Policy to understand how we collect, use, and protect your personal information, as well as how you can exercise your rights with respect to your data.

aiDisclaimer.heading: AI Disclaimer
paragraphs: While we utilize advanced AI models to provide suggestions, insights, or other automated outputs, these features are provided on an 'as-is' basis. The AI may not always produce accurate or error-free results, and you are responsible for verifying the information before relying upon it. RobinAgent disclaims any liability arising from AI-generated outputs that may be incomplete or inaccurate.

section8.heading: 8. Limitation of Liability
paragraphs: RobinAgent shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages resulting from your use or inability to use the Service. While we strive for high accuracy in our AI-powered features, we cannot guarantee perfect results.

The AI-powered functionalities provided by RobinAgent are for informational and educational purposes only and do not constitute legal, financial, health, or any other professional advice. If you need professional advice, please consult a qualified professional.

section9.heading: 9. Changes to Terms
paragraphs: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. We will notify users of any material changes via email or through the Service.

section10.heading: 10. Contact Information
paragraphs: If you have any questions about these Terms, please contact us at support@robinagent.ai

cookieUsage.heading: Cookie Usage
cookieUsage.paragraph: We use cookies to enhance your experience, analyze site traffic, and for personalized advertising.

list.label: Strictly Necessary Cookies
list.description: These cookies are essential for the website to function and cannot be switched off.

list.label: Non-Essential Cookies
list.description: These include analytics and marketing cookies. They are only activated after you give your consent.

yourConsent.heading: Your Consent
yourConsent.paragraph: On your first visit, you will be asked to consent to the use of non-essential cookies. You may accept or decline. Your choice will be respected across all pages of our website.

withdrawalOfConsent.heading: Withdrawal of Consent
withdrawalOfConsent.paragraph: You can change or withdraw your consent at any time by clicking the "Cookie Settings" link in the footer of our website. When you withdraw consent, non-essential cookies will be disabled, and you may notice changes in website functionality.

retention.heading: Retention
retention.paragraph: Your cookie preferences are stored for 365 days. If you do not change your settings, your choice will remain in effect until the cookie expires.

list.label: Analytics
list.description: To understand how visitors interact with our website, which pages are most popular, and how we can improve our service.

list.label: Functionality
list.description: To remember your preferences and provide enhanced, personalized features.

list.label: Security
list.description: To help protect our service and our users from unauthorized access.

contactUs.heading: Contact Us
contactUs.paragraph: If you have any questions about our cookie policy or privacy practices, please contact us through our contact page.
